sentences.sContent: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.sContent_eng: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.sCn: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.sContent: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.sContent_eng: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.sCn: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.sContent: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.sContent_eng: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.sCn: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。
